name: The Golden Simulation
description:
Game i made for the Mini Jam 85 : Gold

The goal is to survive 60 seconds in order to escape the simulation! But be careful, killing enemies will add time, so don't kill to much or you won't be able to escape!

Controls :

Move with mouse direction

Shoot with left mouse button

All assets are made from scratch by me and my GF

Except the music who comes from "Ville Nousiainen". Link: http://soundcloud.com/mutkanto
